definitions.definition: A rounded or conical heap of stones erected by early inhabitants of the British Isles , apparently as a sepulchral monument.
A pile of stones heaped up as a landmark, to guide travelers on land or at sea, or to arrest attention, as in surveying, or in leaving traces of an exploring party, etc.

main_definition: A rounded or conical heap of stones erected by early inhabitants of the British Isles , apparently as a sepulchral monument.
secondary_definitions: A pile of stones heaped up as a landmark, to guide travelers on land or at sea, or to arrest attention, as in surveying, or in leaving traces of an exploring party, etc.
